body.p:
Hickman Ky May 31st 1861
To his Excellency
Beriah Magoffin
Respected Sir

John Cole was fined ^$20 -- ^ at this term of the Fulton Equity and Criminal Court for playing a little Ten cent game of polker Cole is a poore man and it would be difficult for him to pay it at this time, so think his case is one that deserves executive clemency,

yours Respectfuly
Thos H Corbett
Comlths atty

To his Excellency Beriah Magoffin
Frankfort Ky
